description:
Oogami Naoya is a prominent character in the story and part of Akira`s entourage. He is muscular, manly and bossy. He is taller than the two other men the group, aforementioned Akira and Kajiwara Jun, later acts his lackey. After being captured by Maya, he expresses interest in raping "bitchy" Seiya, angering Maya (who is Seiya), leading to his murder.
Naoya`s skin is fair, he has yellow eyes and blond moptop, completed by a widow`s peak. He wears a white tank top, green jeans with a black belt. He also carries around a pair of snowboard glasses, a cross pendant and a fancy satellite watch.
name: Oogami Naoya
